column1: #Text=Aang says : " How do you know it 's me ? "
#Text=Tashi says : " We have known you were the Avatar for some time .
#Text=" Tashi says : " You chose them from among thousands of toys , Aang .
#Text=The toys you picked were the four Avatar relics .
#Text=" Aang says : " I just chose them because they seemed fun .
